description: Времена Future Simple, Future Progressive. Придаточные времени и условия

sentences.eng: Good afternoon!
I am a lobster!
And I can predict the future.
I know what will happen in a few minutes.
sentences.rus: Я знаю, что [случится|случаться|to happen] через несколько минут.

sentences.eng: A queen will come to the stream soon
and she will cry.
But I'll comfort her
and I'll tell her that she will get pregnant very soon,
sentences.rus: и скажу, что она [забеременеет|забеременеть|to get pregnant]

sentences.eng: and in 9 month she will give birth to a daughter.
sentences.rus: и [родит|родить кого-то|to give birth to smb.] дочь.

sentences.eng: She'll be very happy
and she and the king will arrange a feast
sentences.rus: и они с [царем|царь|a king] [устроят целый пир|собрать пир|to arrange the feast],

sentences.eng: when their daughter is born.
But they won't invite one old wicked witch to the feast.
sentences.rus: Но они не [пригласят|приглашать|to invite] на пир одну старую злую [ведьму|ведьма|a witch].

sentences.eng: She'll take offence at them,
sentences.rus: Она [обидится|обидеться на кого-то|to take offence at smb.]

sentences.eng: and instead of a gift she'll make a curse.
sentences.rus: и вместо подарка наложит на [царевну|царевна|a princess] проклятие:

sentences.eng: At the age of 16 the princess will be spinning
and she'll prick her finger and she'll die.
Everybody will be very upset,
and they'll be crying bitterly.
sentences.rus: и будут [горько плакать|горько плакать|to cry bitterly, to weep].

sentences.eng: But then another fairy will come to the baby
sentences.rus: Но потом к младенцу подойдет другая [фея|фея|a fairy]

sentences.eng: and she'll change the curse.
The princess won't die,
but she'll only fall asleep.
Also the king and the queen and all their servants will fall asleep too.
sentences.rus: Будут спать [царь|царь|a king] с [царицей|царица|a queen], и их [слуги|слуги|servants] тоже будут спать.

sentences.eng: The whole castle will be sleeping.
And soon everybody will forget about this castle.
sentences.rus: И вскоре все [забудут|забыть|to forget] этот [замок|замок|a castle].

sentences.eng: But in 300 years the curse will be over,
and one noble prince will find the castle.
sentences.rus: [замок|замок|a castle] найдет один [благородный принц|благородный принц|a noble prince].

sentences.eng: He'll kiss the sleeping beauty
and she'll wake up.
And they will live long and happily.
sentences.rus: И они будут [жить долго и счастливо|жить долго и счастливо|to live long and happily].

sentences.eng: And they will die on the same day.
sentences.rus: И [умрут они в один и тот же день|умереть в один день|to die on the same day].

sentences.eng: I know it for sure,
as I can predict the future.
